consentform.question: Customer consents for their data to be used by EasyRepay to offer other products and services to the customer.
I understand, I make a legal commitment to pay the full purchase price to EasyRepay on time.
Late on Payment? I understand, my Product from EasyRepay will lock, and I will not be able to use it.
Can No Longer Afford to Pay? I must return my working product in the original packaging to the Shop I purchased from through EasyRepay.
Fail to Pay or Return? I understand, EasyRepay will contact the Police and my Village Leader.
I understand that I need to connect to data regularly to keep my phone from EasyRepay unlocked, and I won't be able to unlock the phone without data.
Customer consents to being contacted by EasyRepay.
I understand that if I pay after the due date, I will lose out on usage of the device from EasyRepay for the days I missed.
I understand, I must report the theft to the police and EasyRepay within 2 days.
I understand, my Product from EasyRepay has a 12-month CarlCare warranty for manufacturer defects only.
I understand if I attempt to fraudulently unlock the phone from EasyRepay, this is a Criminal Offence and reported to Police.
I understand if I sell the phone from EasyRepay before paying the full amount, this is a Criminal Offence and reported to Police.
